column1: '''''tîn''''' (also appearing as '''''tin''''' and '''''tĭn''''') is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "spark, sparkle (esp. used of the twinkle of [[stars]])" or "spark, star".<ref name=PE17>{{PE
'''''tîn''''' (or ''tínen'') is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "silent, quiet".<ref name=UI>{{HM
The unattested form '''''tîn''''' is commonly held to mean "his (of nonsubject)" in [[Neo-Elvish
column3: GS}}, p. 325</ref><ref>[[Didier Willis]], [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] at [http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com] (accessed 20 July 2011)</ref>
